verses.verse: For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G846>yourselves<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> entering <S%G1529>in<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> it <S%G1096>hath<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> been found <S%G2756>vain<s%>:

but235, 2532 having suffered <S%G4310>before<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> been shamefully <S%G5195>treated<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> ye <S%G1492>know<s%>, <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G5375>Philippi<s%>, we waxed <S%G3955>bold<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4183>much<s%> <S%G73>conflict<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G3874>exhortation<s%> is <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G4106>error<s%>, <S%G3761>nor<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G167>uncleanness<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1388>guile<s%>:

but <S%G235><s%> even <S%G2531>as<s%> we have been <S%G1381>approved<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> to be intrusted <S%G4100>with<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%>, <S%G3779>so<s%> we <S%G2980>speak<s%>; <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G700>pleasing<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G1381>proveth<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> at any <S%G4218>time<s%> were <S%G1096>we<s%> found using <S%G3056>words<s%> of <S%G2850>flattery<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> ye <S%G1492>know<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> a <S%G4392>cloak<s%> of <S%G4124>covetousness<s%>, <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G3144>witness<s%>;

nor <S%G3777><s%> seeking <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G243>others<s%>, when we <S%G1410>might<s%> <S%G1511>have<s%> <S%G1722>claimed<s%> <S%G922>authority<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> we <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G2261>gentle<s%> in the <S%G1722>midst<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G302><s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> when a <S%G5162>nurse<s%> <S%G2282>cherisheth<s%> <S%G1438>her<s%> own <S%G5043>children<s%>:

even <S%G3779>so<s%>, being affectionately <S%G2442>desirous<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%>, we were well <S%G2106>pleased<s%> to <S%G3330>impart<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> our <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G5590>souls<s%>, <S%G1360>because<s%> ye <S%G1096>were<s%> become very <S%G27>dear<s%> to <S%G2254>us<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> ye <S%G3421>remember<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2873>labor<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3449>travail<s%>: <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2038>working<s%> <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>, <S%G4314>that<s%> we <S%G1912>might<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1912>burden<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%>, we <S%G2784>preached<s%> <S%G1912>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

Ye <S%G5210><s%> are <S%G3144>witnesses<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G5613>also<s%>, how <S%G3743>holily<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1346>righteously<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G274>unblameably<s%> we behaved <S%G1096>ourselves<s%> toward <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%>:

as <S%G2509><s%> ye <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G5613>how<s%> we dealt with <S%G1538>each<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> a <S%G3962>father<s%> with <S%G1438>his<s%> own <S%G5043>children<s%>, <S%G3870>exhorting<s%> <S%G2532>you<s%>, and <S%G3888>encouraging<s%> <S%G2532>you<s%>, and <S%G3140>testifying<s%>,

to the end <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G5209>ye<s%> should <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G516>worthily<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2564>calleth<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1438>his<s%> own <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1391>glory<s%>.

And <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G1223>cause<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2168>thank<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> without <S%G89>ceasing<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%>, when ye <S%G3880>received<s%> <S%G3844>from<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of the <S%G3056>message<s%>, even the word of <S%G2316>God<s%>, ye <S%G1209>accepted<s%> it <S%G3756>not<s%> as the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%>, <S%G2531>as<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> in <S%G230>truth<s%>, the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1754>worketh<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G3588>that<s%> <S%G4100>believe<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G3402>imitators<s%> of the <S%G1577>churches<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3958>suffered<s%> the same <S%G5024>things<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> your <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G4853>countrymen<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2531>as<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> did <S%G5259>of<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>;

who <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2532>both<s%> <S%G615>killed<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2398>the<s%> <S%G4396>prophets<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1559>drove<s%> out <S%G2248>us<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G700>pleased<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> are <S%G1727>contrary<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G444>men<s%>;

forbidding <S%G2967><s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> to <S%G2980>speak<s%> to the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they may be <S%G4982>saved<s%>; <S%G1519>to<s%> fill <S%G378>up<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G266>sins<s%> <S%G3842>always<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> is <S%G5348>come<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G5056>uttermost<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G2249>we<s%>, <S%G80>brethren<s%>, being <S%G642>bereaved<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G4314>for<s%> a <S%G5610>short<s%> <S%G2540>season<s%>, in <S%G4383>presence<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> in <S%G2588>heart<s%>, <S%G4704>endeavored<s%> the more <S%G4056>exceedingly<s%> to <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4314>desire<s%>:

because <S%G1352><s%> we would fain <S%G2309>have<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G530>once<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1364>again<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G1465>hindered<s%> <S%G2532>us<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G2746>glorying<s%>? Are <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%>, <S%G1715>before<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> Jesus2424, 5547 <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3952>coming<s%>?
